titleStmt.title: A recitall of that which hath happened in the kings armie, since the taking of the suburbes of Paris, vntill the taking of the towne of Humflet.

notesStmt.note: A translation from the original French.
With a blank first leaf? Title page is A2.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
Title page has armorial device; head-piece, initial.
